titleStmt.title: SII 13.102: original edition by G.V. Srinivasa Rao
No. 102. (A.R. No. 23 of 1931.) TIRUKKŌḌIKĀVAL, KUMBAKONAM TALUK, TANJORE DISTRICT. ON THE WEST WALL OF THE CENTRAL SHRINE, TIRUKKŌṬĪŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This is one of severāl earlier inscriptions on loose stones which were lying in the temple and were collected and re-engraved on its walls by the order of the king's mother Śembiyan-Mahādēvī in the reign of Uttama-Chōḷa, when the temple was rebuilt by her of stone from its original brick structure (M.E.R. 1931, II, 9). It registers a sale of land, free of taxes, executed by the sabhā of Nāraṇakka-chaturvēdimaṅgalam, a brahmadēya village of Nallāṟṟūr-nāḍu on the north bank, to the temple at Tirukkōḍikkā.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . Ituvum moru paḻaṅka
lpaṭi . kovirājakecaripanmaṟkku yāṇṭu nāṉkāvatu vaṭakarai nallāṟṟūr nāṭṭu brahmadeyam nāraṇakkacaturvetimaṅkalattu sabhaiyom viṟṟa nilavilaiyāvaṇam . Ināṭṭu tirukkoṭi kāvil(p) perumā(ḷ)ḷukku nāṅkaḷ candrātittaval I
ṟai kāttukkuṭukkum Ittevar riṟaiyili yuṇṇa vilaikoṇṭu kuṭutta nilamāvatu Iṉ nāraṇakka caturvetimaṅkalattūriṉ miyūr ki(ḻ)ḻaiiṭaikaṇṭattu sabhaiyom koṭṭip puṟattu Aṉṉanti kramavittaṉum kārampiceṭṭu muttatāmo
tira kramavittaṉum Ivaṉ tampi nārāyaṇa kramavittaṉum pakkal sabhaiyom vilaikoṇṭu Uṭaiya mukkāl ceykkum kiḻpāṟkellai surasārampi nilakaṇṭapaṭṭaṉum kārampicceṭṭu Akkumārakkramavittaṉum muṉtiya nilattukkum nāṭṭār
vāykkāliṉ niṉṟum vaṭakkuṉokki ponta Uḷ ciṟuvāykkālukkum meṟkum teṉpāṟk kellai koṭṭippuṟattu Aṉṉan=tikramavittan nilattukku vaṭakkum melpāṟkellai nāṭṭār vāykkālniṉṟum vaṭakkunokki ponta vativāykkālukkuk kiḻakkum vaṭapā
ṟkellai tiṭaṟceri nattattu sabhaiyom kuṭimakka(ḷ)ḷukku viṟṟa nilattukkut teṟkum Ivicaitta perunāṉkellaiyilum Akappaṭṭa nilam meṭum paḷḷamum Uḷpaṭa mukkāl ceyum viṟṟu vilaiyāvaṇam ceytu kuṭuttom tirukkoṭikā
vildevaṟkku Iṟaiyum Ecco(ṟ)ṟum Eppeṟpaṭṭa veṭṭiyum puṟav(ā)ri(y)yum cantrātittaval kāttuk kuṭuppomāṉom nāraṇakkac caturvetimaṅkalattu sabhaiyom . Itu paḻaya kal paṭi Inta śrīvimānattile Eṟ(ṟa) veṭṭinamaiyil muṉ
ṉivājagam veṭṭikkiṭan=ta taṉi kallāl Ubhaiyokam Illāmaiyāl Atu tavirntatu Itu muṭṭil paṉmāyeśvara kaṭai kūṭṭa peṟṟār .
Digital edition of SII 13.102 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
